## Description

The Cary 3500 Flexible UV-Vis Spectrophotometer is a double-beam ultraviolet-visible spectrophotometer designed for high-precision photometric measurements of both liquid and solid samples. It features a xenon flash lamp light source, eliminating warm-up time and reducing maintenance frequency. The instrument supports a wavelength range of 190â€“1100 nm and offers a variable spectral bandwidth from 0.1 to 5.0 nm, adjustable in 0.01 nm increments.
